component.description: PrimeFaces features a resizable component that has the ability to make a JSF component resizable. Resizable can be used on various components like resize an input fields, panels, menus, images and more.

attribute.name: id
attribute.description: Unique identifier of the component in a namingContainer.

attribute.name: rendered
attribute.description: Boolean value to specify the rendering of the component, when set to false component will not be rendered.

attribute.name: binding
attribute.description: An el expression referring to a server side UIComponent instance in a backing bean.

attribute.name: widgetVar
attribute.description: Name of the client side widget.

attribute.name: for
attribute.description: Identifier of the target component to make resizable.

attribute.name: aspectRatio
attribute.description: Defines if aspectRatio should be kept or not. Default is false.

attribute.name: proxy
attribute.description: Displays proxy element instead of actual element.

attribute.name: handles
attribute.description: Specifies the resize handles.

attribute.name: ghost
attribute.description: In ghost mode, resize helper is displayed as the original element with less opacity. Default is false.

attribute.name: animate
attribute.description: Enables animation. Default is false.

attribute.name: effect
attribute.description: Effect to use in animation. Default is swing.

attribute.name: effectDuration
attribute.description: Effect duration of animation. Default is normal.

attribute.name: maxWidth
attribute.description: Maximum width boundary in pixels. Default is max integer value.

attribute.name: maxHeight
attribute.description: Maximum height boundary in pixels. Default is max integer value.

attribute.name: minWidth
attribute.description: Minimum width boundary in pixels. Default is min integer value.

attribute.name: minHeight
attribute.description: Maximum height boundary in pixels. Default is min integer value.

attribute.name: containment
attribute.description: Sets resizable boundaries as the parents size. Default is false.

attribute.name: grid
attribute.description: Snaps resizing to grid structure. Default is 1.

attribute.name: onStart
attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when resizing begins.

attribute.name: onResize
attribute.description: Client side callback to execute during resizing.

attribute.name: onStop
attribute.description: Client side callback to execute after resizing end.
